attributes.action: Ban Child-Less People Parking in Parent & Child Spaces!
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to enforce the same rules for "Disabled" spaces - to "Parent & Child" spaces. These zones should be monitored at ALL times in all supermarkets, covered with CCTV & threatened with a fine for parking there "illegally" as it should be. 

There is no reason for the Parent & Child spaces to be any less important than the Disabled one's, and it's about time they were taken seriously! 

It's NOT okay to use them, and leave no spaces for parents to struggle! 

Let's get this done!
attributes.background: There are far too many people who think they're far too superior to pay attention to the "Parent & Child" parking zones. I've had to shout at far too people since becoming a parent, for parking in RESERVED spaces particularly for parents with children.
